Who: LEGACY, Tuscon, Perceptor
Location: Tunnels leading away from Black Fortress

> "What was that? " said the male and started to calculate the place where the
> scream came and once he had done it, he scanned the area looking for
> signatures

From Perceptor's calculations the screams came from several hundred
meters down the tunnel and was moving quickly away from the three of
them, and the sound of the voice was Rodimus'. A scan reveals some
sort of mechanoid, possibly minion in origin carrying a shape or mass
that could possibly be Rodimus. The creature read as insect like,
although the shape was unfamiliar. However the creature quickly
continued down the tunnel out of easy scanning range.

Also Perceptor may remember from a report from Scorponok that these
tunnels used to lead all the way back to the Ark, beneath the Earth's
ocean. Although it is unlikely that all the tunnel is still intact
after all this time.

However there is one notable fact in there: There was a fairly large
chamber about half way or so that appeared to be filled with some sort
of minion based technology. Scorponok's last view of the chamber was
it being filled with magma. Whether it survived or not is unknown.

(TAG)

Preston
